title: #RedfishExtensions.v1_0_0

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

EnumerationMember.description: This type describes a member of an enumeration used for compatability purposes for enumerations which do not comply with OData rules.
EnumerationMember.longDescription: This type shall describe a member of an enumeration which contains spaces, starts with a number, or otherwise does not comply with OData EnumMember naming rules.

enumDescriptions.InDevelopment: Un-released work product currently under development or review.
enumDescriptions.WorkInProgress: Released as Work In Progress, subject to change perhaps profoundly and without notice.
enumDescriptions.Informational: Released as an informational, non-normative document.
enumDescriptions.Standard: Released as normative standard or specification.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Type.description: The type that the name shall have.

Pattern.description: The pattern that the property name shall match.

PropertyPattern.description: The pattern by which property names must adhere.
PropertyPattern.longDescription: This type shall describe the pattern to which a dynamic property name must adhere.
